episodes.title: Cult Survivor Explains Brainwashing Techniques | DEEPX
episodes.description:
What is gaslighting? How to understand if you're being love bombed in a romantic relationship? Cult survivor and mental health expert Petra Verzeboer unpacks what are the cult-like techniques that people use in everyday life, how to recognise them and what to do to protect yourself - new episodes of DEEP X every week.

00:34 - Corporate companies: HR and Management
03:31 - Gaslighting
04:31 - Coercive control
05:10 - Self-help and coaching groups
06:22 - Politicians' messaging
07:32 - Romantic relationships
10:15 - Advice on what to do

Thanks to Petra for taking part! 
https://www.petravelzeboer.com/ 
You can buy Petra's book here: https://amzn.eu/d/fJIxd4a 
Welcome to DEEP - a brand new channel that brings you incredible people with amazing stories from all over the world.

If you've seen the team's previous work - Minutes With/The Gap/Agree To Disagree...then you know what to expect!

Let us know if there's anyone in particular you think we should speak to - we love bringing you stories and want to hear what you like.

Thanks and we hope you enjoy!
